channel.title: ClashXR ChangeLog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.description:
• Update core version to 3ccd7de.
  • Update default benchmark url to http://cp.cloudflare.com/generate_204.
  • Auto detect config filename when add remote config.
  • Speedup launch time.
  • Auto health check to proxy groups when network environment changed.
  • Bugfixs
